projectGridLines.title: Computer Vision - Video Presentations
projectGridLines.description:
Description: We are seeking a talented and motivated Computer Vision expert to join our team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge video presentation solutions. In this role, you will work closely with our experienced engineers and product managers to create intelligent algorithms that analyze video content and generate captivating presentations based on user preferences and brand guidelines.


Skill sets: 

  • Currently pursuing or completing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
  • Strong foundation in computer vision, image processing, and machine learning.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C++, or Java.
  • Experience with computer vision libraries and frameworks like OpenCV, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is a plus.
  • Knowledge of video processing and analysis techniques.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.

Traits expectation: 


  • Quick Learner & motivated individual
  • Excellent problem-solving skills
  • Ability to think creatively
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
  • Adapt to changing priorities


Expected learning: 


  • Opportunity to work on cutting-edge video technology that impacts millions of creators.
  • Mentorship and guidance from experienced engineers and industry experts.
  • Collaborative and inclusive work environment that values innovation and creativity.
  • Exposure to real-world challenges and the chance to develop practical skills.
  • Competitive compensation and potential for full-time employment upon successful completion of the internship

Specific courses required for project execution:  


  • Strong foundation in computer vision, image processing, and machine learning.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C++, or Java.
  • Experience with computer vision libraries and frameworks like OpenCV, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is a plus.

projectGridLines.title: Youtube API and LLM - Video Snippet Generation
projectGridLines.description:
Description: We are seeking a talented and motivated developer to join our team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge video snippet generation solutions. In this role, you will work closely with our experienced engineers and product managers to leverage YouTube APIs and Large Language Models (LLMs) to create intelligent algorithms that analyze long-form video content and generate concise, engaging snippets.


Skill sets:


  • Currently pursuing or completing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
  • Strong foundation in natural language processing, machine learning, and data analysis.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or Java.
  • Experience working with APIs, particularly YouTube APIs, is a plus.
  • Familiarity with LLMs such as GPT, Gemini, Claude or similar models.
  • Knowledge of video processing and analysis techniques.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.

Traits expectation:

 

  • Quick Learner & motivated individual
  • Excellent problem-solving skills
  • Ability to think creatively
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
  • Adapt to changing priorities


Expected learning:


  • Opportunity to work on cutting-edge video technology that impacts millions of creators.
  • Mentorship and guidance from experienced engineers and industry experts.
  • Collaborative and inclusive work environment that values innovation and creativity.
  • Exposure to real-world challenges and the chance to develop practical skills.
  • Competitive compensation and potential for full-time employment upon successful completion of the internship.

Specific courses required for project execution: 


  • Strong foundation in natural language processing, machine learning, and data analysis.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or Java.
  • Experience working with APIs, particularly YouTube APIs, is a plus.
  • Familiarity with LLMs such as GPT, Gemini, Claude or similar models.
  • Knowledge of video processing and analysis techniques.
